an2.11:2.2: yamidaṃ → yadidaṃ (si, s1-3), sekhānametaṃ → sekhametaṃ (bj, s1-3, km) | sekhānaṃ etaṃ (pts1)
an2.15:1.2: na phāsuṃ → na phāsukaṃ (bj) | na phāsu (mr), viharissantī’ti → viharissanti (bj, s1-3, km, mr)
an2.15:2.4: Maṃ so → tasmā maṃ so (s1-3) | taṃ maṃ so (pts1)
an2.19:1.3: cedaṃ → no ce taṃ (bj, s1-3, km, pts1, mr)
